item.description:
You've asked and we're responding!! Join us as we kickoff a series of networking meetings and panel discussions at Babson College in Wellesley.

On Thursday, August 21st from 6 - 8 pm, help us get the ball rolling with a straight up networking event at the Bottom Line Lounge on the campus of Babson College. Follow the signs to the Babson Executive Conference Center. Parking is available. Appetizers provided. Cash bar.

We're excited to be able to offer a Metrowest location for the Boston Entrepreneurs Group. Stay tuned for information on additional networking and panel discussions coming this fall.

Looking forward to seeing you all there.
item.name: Boston Entrepreneurs Goes Metrowest!!
